title: Healthy Ep. 8 - Grief & Unanswered Questions with Bethany Barnard
description:
What do you do with seasons of deep grief, sadness, and unanswered questions? Come listen to my friend Beth's journey and listen to her songs of lament that might give you words for your own story.

Listen to Beth's album on Spotify here: https://open.spotify.com/album/1AwcQ280Btee4Aol4d0lpC?si=8U8a_SmIT6yLqU1kZ0CkQA&dl_branch=1

$20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/madeforthis
